title: Bill Hwang Was a $20 Billion Whale, Then Lost It All in Two Days
itunes:title: Bill Hwang Was a $20 Billion Whale, Then Lost It All in Two Days
description:
Eric Schatzker, Bloomberg Editor-at-Large, discusses his story: “Bill Hwang Was a $20 Billion Whale, Then Lost It All in Two Days.” Lindsey Piegza, Chief Economist at Stifel, on why additional spending is not the answer. Dr. Steven Corwin, New York-Presbyterian President & CEO, on the covid-19 vaccination rollout success--and why we still need to be cautious. Jared Dillian, Bloomberg Opinion columnist and author of The Daily Dirtnap, discusses his column: “SPACs Aren't the Only Examples of Late Capitalism.” Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Jared Dillian, Bloomberg Opinion columnist and author of The Daily Dirtnap, discusses his column: “SPACs Aren't the Only Examples of Late Capitalism.” Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.
